entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 9:14 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
